answers.answer: I feel yah! 21 weeks pregnant and not one dr has seen me yet. I have to see a midwife who knows nothing. I say that truthfully. I have suffered from severe nasal congestion for almost 6 months and had to see my regular dr bc I was told by the midwife I basically had to suffer. Thank Goodness I went to my Drs.bc they put me on allergy meds and Im so much better. How many other obgyns do you have around you? I would have to drive an hour to see a new one. Still debating it bc its my fifth pregnancy and I shoot my babies out quickly!
I would change drs. With a family history of preeclampsia and headaches they should not be messing around. Get a new obgyn.

I would change M.D.s as soon as possible because the further along you are the harder it will be to find a new doc that will pick u up due to liability issues. I switched my doctor at 20 weeks bc he was being negligent in testing me for certain fetal risks.

I agree with alid32. The fact that you have a strong family history of preeclampsia, and you are experiencing high BP with headaches, it would raise some concerns in my thoughts. I would definitely be looking into a different doctor/midwife if you're not satisfied with your current treatment. I would express your concerns to the new doctor and see what their opinion is. It never hurts to get a second or third opinion in cases like yours. From what you're saying, I would be concerned too. I wish you the best of luck mama.
Just make sure u get copies of all the tests that were performed on u before u leave just in case they start acting funny and dont want to send results to the new doctor
Thank you girls for all the advice i went to a new doc today and i now have to see how it goes !!:)
Good for you! We are our own best advocate! Wishing you the best:)

question: Ok so i go to a practice that has 5 different doctors. I am 23-24 weeks. When i had really strong migraines each dr told me something different one of them told me to take percoset which i refused to take. But now my issue is i have being having high blood pressure AND THEY DO NOTHING BUT TELL ME TO stop taking it and wait more weeks. I feel FRUSTRATED AND SCARED i can say that all of my family members have had preclamsia while they are pregnant and i am really worried.
title: What should I do i absolutely hate my DR's
